data.what_is: The next generation B2B marketing and customer communication platform. Send highly personalized messages with user engagement data without waiting on product or data teams. Guide your users to quicker onboarding, better adoption, and get more revenue and pipeline. The power of Marketo, ease of use of Intercom, data of Snowflake.
data.product_description: The future of B2B marketing is product-led and at Inflection.io, we believe this new end-user area will require innovative solutions that are purposefully built for product-led companies. Inflection.io puts product activity data at the center of solution design and optimizes for the scalability and extensibility demands of the modern product-led marketing team.

plan_features: Support for User Org Journeys & related data objects
Free unpersonalized batch emails to 10X the size of your contracted MMCs

initial_reviews.review_title: Built from the ground up for the next wave of B2B marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection.io is an incredibly dynamic, feature rich solution for PLG communication that's easy to use and has an awesome team supporting it.

Switching over from Marketo, I had my reservations, but it didn't take long to throw them out the window.  Features, functionality, implementation - working with their team and the tool made this switch very smooth.

Their pricing structure makes so much more sense for PLG organizations than traditional database size MAP pricing. Without worrying about database size, there are no throttles to the product growth you can aim for.

Easily integrated with Segment.

This tool will go far.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Inflection.io is not built to support your traditional outbound demand generation email strategy. Smaller, more pin-point behavioural communiction are the bread and butter here however they have recently offered access to limited, higher volume sends to support something like a newsletter. You won't be able to blast your database with Inflection.io but hey should you really be doing that anyway?

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection.io helped us power highly contextual, reactive product-led communication with our users. Purpose-built for PLG communication, we could stop paying for middleman tech solutions that integrated our Segment data with Marketo. Big tech-stack savings for better PLG functionality. No brainer.

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect for product-usage triggered communications with more to come!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Driving communications to high valued users has been a game changer for Tapcart. The ability to drive highly contextual emails to power users in our product has fundamentally changed the way we execute referral request outreach. The set up was simple and the results have been tremendous!

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
We made the investment in Inflection with the medium-term goal in time to consolidate our existing marketing automation stack into this platform. This will likely take a tad longer than I expected.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeting high-usage customers with new products; driving increased usage by celebrating certain purchase milestones via the app

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Targeting high-usage customers with new products; driving increased usage by celebrating certain purchase milestones via the app

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Partnering with Inflection has been terrific! Access to product activity data has enabled Stack Moxie to deliver highly relevant communications to our users. We send weekly usage recap emails to our customers, which continually reinforces the value users are getting from our service. Additionally, we have transitioned our new user onboarding communications from Marketo to Inflection, which has enabled us to drive emails based on product activity. Inflection has been a total game changer!

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
I would like to be able review data in a more systematic way.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Product Led Groth Initiatives

Inflection has been a total game changer!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Product Led Groth Initiatives

initial_reviews.review_title: Powering the next generation of product-led growth
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection integrates seamlessly with Segment to allow me to take action on the events my product users are completing. Inflection allows me to intelligently communicate with end users to craft onboarding and adoption sequences that drive increased growth.  The email building wizard is easy to use and tokens are powerful drivers of additional data.

We automated a process a human on my team was doing for 8 hours a week into a recurring email. No more manually building reports, now users get it automatically in a weekly digest. Thanks Inflection!

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
As Inflection's first customer, Stack Moxie were alpha build partners for figuring out how a lot of super nerdy things worked. We didn't always find the best way to do it the first time, but don't worry, we figured out better ways and you'll never get to experience the things I've disliked about Inflection.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
We talk a lot about Product Ah Has. What are the meaningful moments a user has where they understand how Stack Moxie will meaningfully impact their business. Inflection now has the capabilities to be a core driver of those Ah Ha journeys. In conjunction with our in-app experiences, Inflection handles the external communications with our users to drive them back into the product and with higher adoption. Stack Moxie > Inflection > Candu > Segment all working together to maintain a single unified product experience for our clients. A super win.

review_question_answers.answer:

The email building wizard is easy to use and tokens are powerful drivers of additional data.

We automated a process a human on my team was doing for 8 hours a week into a recurring email. No more manually building reports, now users get it automatically in a weekly digest. Thanks Inflection!

initial_reviews.review_title: Doing the impossible with plg, data and marketing together
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection.io took most of what was in our manual processes and data manipulation and added it to timely, relevant emails to our users.  This information is critical for our users understanding the value of the product, converting to paying users.  It simply wasn't possible with the other tools on the market.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
We were super early, so we've kicked down some walls together.  That said, it is one of the better things - as we've had challenges in usability or function, Inflection has been an awesome partner.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
PLG communications.  When a free user uses our product, how do we show them how many fails they had, how much time it saved their marketing operations team, and how much value in lost leads or broken campaigns.  Iflection aggregates it and represents it.

This information is critical for our users understanding the value of the product, converting to paying users.  It simply wasn't possible with the other tools on the market.

initial_reviews.review_title: Communications that customers care about directly tied to product value
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection effortlessly takes in our product events and allows us to trigger relevant and timely communications based on what the user tries to do and how they use our products.
We can reach customers faster and re-engage our new customers through a valuable channel - email.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Reporting and analyzing the results of our experiments/initiatives is very important to me. Some manual work is required to pull data from Inflection right now, but I know good things are on the roadmap!

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching customers directly tied to their in-product actions and expected value.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Inflection.io?
review_question_answers.answer:

review_question_answers.answer: Reporting and analyzing the results of our experiments/initiatives is very important to me. Some manual work is required to pull data from Inflection right now, but I know good things are on the roadmap!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Reaching customers directly tied to their in-product actions and expected value.

initial_reviews.review_title: A powerful tool for streamlining your onboarding process with ease
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
The user interface is clean and intuitive, making navigating through the data and the email builder super easy. The tool offers a variety of ways to customize your approach to creating onboarding email content tailored to fit your customers and prospects.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
The tool has terrific potential! As always, there are minor tweaks that can make their features even more flexible and robust.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection.io has helped us immensely with our onboarding and product-led growth.  The way they have been able to automate things our team has been doing over and over has given us a lot of our time back.

review_question_answers.answer: Inflection.io has helped us immensely with our onboarding and product-led growth.  The way they have been able to automate things our team has been doing over and over has given us a lot of our time back.

Inflection has helped us have better engagement with our customers, streamlining operational headaches related to understanding all their product activity and turning it into actionable engagements with them.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
I truly have no problems.  It has been a great partnership!

initial_reviews.review_title: Customer centric marketing automation for a product-led world.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Super flexible filters and personalization. Intuitive enough for anyone to use but powerful enough to take advantage of all your data.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Working through some specific needs for account to user relationships. The team is super open to feedback.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection runs all our onboarding and trial communications. So easy for me to experiment and optimize for conversion. Way more flexible than using our support tool for communications.

I am now playing with some milestone type campaigns to drive adoption and plan to move our customer newsletter over.

Inflection runs all our onboarding and trial communications. So easy for me to experiment and optimize for conversion. Way more flexible than using our support tool for communications.

I am now playing with some milestone type campaigns to drive adoption and plan to move our customer newsletter over.

It's easy to use and very useful platform for every marketer and sellers.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
I dislike the packaging after free trail but overall it's fair.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing fuels PLG engine with MQLs to attract initial users into viral loops.

initial_reviews.review_title: This is a great tool for onboarding your product users
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Direct access to the data for segmenting users and triggering relevant emails

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Not yet a complete replacement for marketing automation

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection makes it easy to build behavior-triggered workflows, so that onboarding emails are relevant and timely for new users.  That improves our adoption rate and speeds up time to value.

review_question_answers.answer: Direct access to the data for segmenting users and triggering relevant emails

initial_reviews.review_title: Inflection.io is a great tool for your B2B Marketing usage
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Detailed marketing pipeline for your B2B customers and target users. Used Funnel approach for your campaigns.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Sometimes its scalability and extension with other popular marketing tool have some limitations

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Customer conversation, reach, customer interaction, B2B business expansion

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
The startup founder is a visionary with a wealth of experience in this domain. The product is extremely user friendly built with the customers priorities first.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
There is scope to creating better-optimized customer experiences by automating the behind-the-scenes processes and communicating clearly with your customers across multi-channels.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Help by attracting the right audience, boost conversions and run end to end campaigns at scale with an engaging user friendly interface in an efficient manner easily.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection.io took most of what was in our manual processes and data manipulation and added it to timely, relevant emails to our users.  This information is critical for our users understanding the value of the product, converting to paying users.  It simply wasn't possible with the other tools on the market.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
We were super early, so we've kicked down some walls together.  That said, it is one of the better things - as we've had challenges in usability or function, Inflection has been an awesome partner.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
PLG communications.  When a free user uses our product, how do we show them how many fails they had, how much time it saved their marketing operations team, and how much value in lost leads or broken campaigns.  Iflection aggregates it and represents it.

all_reviews.review_title: Communications that customers care about directly tied to product value
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Inflection effortlessly takes in our product events and allows us to trigger relevant and timely communications based on what the user tries to do and how they use our products.
We can reach customers faster and re-engage our new customers through a valuable channel - email.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Reporting and analyzing the results of our experiments/initiatives is very important to me. Some manual work is required to pull data from Inflection right now, but I know good things are on the roadmap!

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching customers directly tied to their in-product actions and expected value.

We can reach customers faster and re-engage our new customers through a valuable channel - email.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Reaching customers directly tied to their in-product actions and expected value.

all_reviews.review_title: A powerful tool for streamlining your onboarding process with ease
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
The user interface is clean and intuitive, making navigating through the data and the email builder super easy. The tool offers a variety of ways to customize your approach to creating onboarding email content tailored to fit your customers and prospects.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
The tool has terrific potential! As always, there are minor tweaks that can make their features even more flexible and robust.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection.io has helped us immensely with our onboarding and product-led growth.  The way they have been able to automate things our team has been doing over and over has given us a lot of our time back.

all_reviews.review_title: Customer centric marketing automation for a product-led world.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Super flexible filters and personalization. Intuitive enough for anyone to use but powerful enough to take advantage of all your data.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Working through some specific needs for account to user relationships. The team is super open to feedback.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection runs all our onboarding and trial communications. So easy for me to experiment and optimize for conversion. Way more flexible than using our support tool for communications.

I am now playing with some milestone type campaigns to drive adoption and plan to move our customer newsletter over.

all_reviews.review_title: This is a great tool for onboarding your product users
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
Direct access to the data for segmenting users and triggering relevant emails

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Not yet a complete replacement for marketing automation

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inflection makes it easy to build behavior-triggered workflows, so that onboarding emails are relevant and timely for new users.  That improves our adoption rate and speeds up time to value.

all_reviews.review_content:

Detailed marketing pipeline for your B2B customers and target users. Used Funnel approach for your campaigns.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
Sometimes its scalability and extension with other popular marketing tool have some limitations

Customer conversation, reach, customer interaction, B2B business expansion

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Inflection.io?
The startup founder is a visionary with a wealth of experience in this domain. The product is extremely user friendly built with the customers priorities first.

What do you dislike about Inflection.io?
There is scope to creating better-optimized customer experiences by automating the behind-the-scenes processes and communicating clearly with your customers across multi-channels.

What problems is Inflection.io solving and how is that benefiting you?
Help by attracting the right audience, boost conversions and run end to end campaigns at scale with an engaging user friendly interface in an efficient manner easily.
